text: when you have women sitting at the table
when you have women as policymakers you
get different types of legislation
[Music]
I think you see a lot more legislation
that concerns issues that affect us we
of course continue to have great
legislation around the economy and
around health care but we've got bills
that are specific to women's needs we've
got bills that are looking at sexual
harassment in the workplace especially
among certain elected officials and
saying we are ending those practices now
we're having conversations that in no
way would have been had ten years ago or
with kind of old school thinking if you
would around issues that could be
discussed by a legislature regardless of
what is happening in a political
landscape when it comes to your own
state legislature you've got to have
diversity you have to have vast
representation and getting women to the
table in a meaningful way in a
significant way that can change the
conversation is the first step we
realize that this isn't just about an
individual anymore this is bigger this
is about a moment in which we have the
ability to show the world what it means
when you have women at the table
